{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=WAP354 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2006 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800A-7TL |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561S |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:12:0E |oui_eth=00:12:0E }} ''802.11a/b/g Wireless 5-Port Access Point''
[http://www.abocom.com.tw/product.aspx?id=FE4D41124B75480F597E88344F05F0F9 Product page] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=41970 On the OpenWrt forums] (internal images)
[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/abocom-wap354-80211abg-wireless-5port-access-point-1542 On SpeedGuide.net] [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Realtek_SOC Listed on the '''Realtek SOC''' page on linux-mips.org] Per the datasheet... *'''Transmit power''' **802.11a: 11-13dBm **802.11g: 13-15dBm **802.11b: 16-18dBm *'''Receiver Sensitivity''' **-65dBm @ 54Mbps, 10% PER **-80dBm @ 11Mbps, 8% PER The sample SSID in the manual is '''WirelessAP'''. :There is are 7 hits for this SSID with an 00:12:0E OUI in WiGLE, one being on a 5GHz channel.
